bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a 1D object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: you must push a soft object to make more space in the bin, however, if there is a fragile object on the soft object, you must not push the object
